question: Question_05_(d)
statement:
A matrix \emph{A} and a vector \emph{b} are given by

$\displaystyle A = \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 \\ 1 & 1 \\ 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

$\displaystyle b = \begin{bmatrix} 2 \\ 3 \\ 4 \end{bmatrix}$

Determine if $\displaystyle Ax = b$ is solvable. Find x if it is
solvable and find x (i.e. the least squares solution) if it is not.
